moa.clusterers

Class AbstractClusterer

  • java.lang.Object
    • moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
        • moa.clusterers.AbstractClusterer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Clusterer, moa.gui.AWTRenderable, moa.MOAObject, moa.options.OptionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmidstClusteringAlgorithm, ClusterGenerator, CobWeb, WekaClusteringAlgorithm

    public abstract class AbstractClusterer
extends moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
implements Clusterer

      • prepareForUseImpl

        public void prepareForUseImpl(moa.tasks.TaskMonitor monitor,
                              moa.core.ObjectRepository repository)
        Description copied from class: moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
        This method describes the implementation of how to prepare this object for use. All classes that extends this class have to implement prepareForUseImpl and not prepareForUse since prepareForUse calls prepareForUseImpl.
        Specified by:
        prepareForUseImpl in class moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
        Parameters:
        monitor - the TaskMonitor to use
        repository - the ObjectRepository to use
